title: 831- Mandolorian | Mandaborian Ep1
description:
Who’s that behind the helm, you’ll never know as you sleep deep cradled in lulls, so I’ll tell who, the man who’s borin-ya.

(You can find all of our sponsors or become a patron on our new website http://www.sleepwithmepodcast.com story starts at about 20:00)\

Commission a song from the Mystery Bard over at http://www.jonathanmann.net

Research
Chit https://dictionary.cambridge.org/us/dictionary/english/chit
Puck https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Puck_(folklore)https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hockey_puck
The Guild https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guildhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/TheGuild(web_series)
Pokemon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pok%C3%A9mon
Hovercraft https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hovercraft
Cash Cab https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/CashCab(Americangameshow)
Nothing Shocking https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nothing%27s_Shocking
Storm Winter Doors NYC Chi https://www.quora.com/Why-do-many-New-York-City-restaurants-have-a-plastic-box-like-extension-and-plastic-door-at-their-entrancehttps://www.eater.com/2017/1/31/14445302/restaurant-vestibule-winter-warmerhttps://metropolisny.com/2017/10/the-metropolis-guide-to-vestibule-faqs/

This week the show is sponsored by-\

Cove- is on a mission to make migraines less of a headache.  Anyone who’s had a migraine headache knows that they’re the absolute worst.  Now it’s easier to treat your condition from the comfort of your own home. No more waiting for doctor appointments, paying expensive co-pays, and standing in line at the pharmacy. Thanks to Cove, you can now get your prescription migraine medication delivered directly to your door. For a limited time, get your first month of medication FREE. Visit: WITHCOVE.com/sleep

Casper- Get $100 toward select mattresses by visiting http://www.casper.com/sleepwith and using “sleepwith” at checkout. Terms and Conditions apply. You can be sure of your purchase with Casper’s 100 night risk-free, sleep-on-it trial.

Four Sigmatic- A natural superfood company that specializes in mushroom-based drinks that benefit immunity, energy, and longevity, and help us live healthier, more enhanced lives.Four Sigmatic makes a wide variety of blends, including mushroom coffee, mushroom elixirs, hot cacaos, matcha, superfood blends, and more. Use www.foursigmatic.com/sleepwithme or promo code “sleepwithme” for 15% off your purchase. Make their Mushroom Hot Caco With Reishi or Reishi Elixir a part of your wind-down routine! Sip it like Scoots as you read and relax.

Quip- The sensitive sonic toothbrush I have been using for over two years (not over and over! Changing out the brush heads every three months!) Quip starts at just $25 and if you go to http://www.getquip.com/sleep, you get your first refill pack for FREE with a quip electric toothbrush.
